name: Quipper
desc: A quipper is a carnivorous fish with sharp teeth. Quippers can adapt to any aquatic environment, including cold subterranean lakes. They frequently gather in swarms; the statistics for a swarm of quippers appear later in this appendix.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The quipper can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
